titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1936 PARRAIN Renewed. 1v 3m. Nov. 21 - Feb. 21. 1937. 40 Deposit 30 ref. temporarily RMParrain repaid Dep. Jan 9 Nov. 21 Three Men in a boat. Nov. 23 23 Jailed for <*> Dec 1 Dec 1 New Arabian Nights Dec. 3 Dec. 3 Island nights' entertainments Dec 5. 5 Kidnapped returned? ? ? Catriona returned Dec 14 Dec 14 Glimpses of Unfamiliar Japan 1st Series Dec 18 suspended during vacation has 2 months & 7 days left Renewed. Jan 9. - March 16 Jan 9 Bride of Lammermoor Jan 23 23. Rob Roy Jan 27 27. Heart of MidLothian Feb. 11. 11 Ivanhoe. Feb 18 18 Great Expectations, Uncommercial Feb 24 Traveler etc. Feb 24 Dombey & Son Mar 16. returned March 15
1935 PARRAIN Oct 4 Mlle Rose Maris Parrain 5 rue Amyot 5e
3 mos 1 v 40 dep 30 to 4 Dec refunded 20 Dec. Oct 4 Henry Esmond 10 10 - Spectator (Chandos) 14 14 - Paris Sketch Book 18 18 - Plays 4th Series Galsworthy 19 19 Patrician 26 26. Justice 28 28 - Book of snobs 6 6 Nov. Newcomers 12 12 - Round about papers 16 16 - Shakespeare v. IV (W A. Wright) 18 18 Poetical Works Pope 20 20 Bride of Lammermoor 23 23. Note of Music 26 26 Invitation Ã la valse 29 29 Trembling of a Leaf 30 30 Nov. Painted Veil 2 Dec 2 Dec Of human bondage 20 Dec.
